name: part_002
file: tmp_【生誕祭】百鬼あやめ 4th Birth Dayライブ!!!!!!!!!!! 　＃百鬼あやめ4th生誕祭 [bn7OaRnM9-A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Asuiro Clear Sky'.

subtitles.original: 伝え合った 心の温度を
subtitles.english: The warmth of our hearts we shared,

subtitles.original: そっと 大事そうに 抱え歩いていた
subtitles.english: I walked, gently clutching it as if it were precious

subtitles.original: 答えのない 願いの中で
subtitles.english: Within a wish that has no answer,

subtitles.original: 言葉は 未来 変えて
subtitles.english: words change the future

subtitles.original: 幼い頃 ずっと 夢に見ていた
subtitles.english: Something I’d dreamed of since I was a child

subtitles.original: 私には まだ 遠いけど
subtitles.english: It’s still out of reach for me, but...

subtitles.original: 君がいれば
subtitles.english: ...if you are here,

subtitles.original: 少しは強くなれる気がして
subtitles.english: I feel like I can become a little stronger

subtitles.original: 明日の色を重ねる歌
subtitles.english: A song that layers the colors of tomorrow

subtitles.original: 呼んだ希望辿って 止めた世界を超えた
subtitles.english: Following the hope I called for, I surpassed the frozen world

subtitles.original: 諦めない想い いつしか心繋げた
subtitles.english: Feelings that won't give up eventually connected our hearts

subtitles.original: 泣いていたって笑って 明日迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Even if we were crying, let's smile and go greet tomorrow

subtitles.original: 決めた誓い辛くて 倒れても
subtitles.english: Even if the oath I made is painful and I fall...

subtitles.original: 君のココロを守るため
subtitles.english: ...it's all to protect your heart

subtitles.original: 記憶のない 時の流れに
subtitles.english: In the flow of time where memories are absent,

subtitles.original: きっと 求めていた 暖かさはあって
subtitles.english: the warmth I was seeking must surely be there

subtitles.original: 包まれた 瞬間すべての
subtitles.english: At the moment I was enveloped, all my...

subtitles.original: 想いは 君へ巡る
subtitles.english: ...feelings came circling back to you

subtitles.original: 空に向かって 走り手にした
subtitles.english: I ran toward the sky and grasped

subtitles.original: 幾つもの 尊い光 胸にしまって
subtitles.english: many precious lights, tucking them into my chest

subtitles.original: 私の中の 輝きに変え
subtitles.english: Turning them into a radiance within me,

subtitles.original: 迷いを 全部払って飛ぼう
subtitles.english: I'll cast away all hesitation and fly

subtitles.original: 正解の見えない 入り組んだ迷路を抜け
subtitles.english: Escaping the intricate maze where the right answer is hidden

subtitles.original: 君が流した涙で 心目覚めた
subtitles.english: My heart was awakened by the tears you shed

subtitles.original: そして知った世界は こんなにもまだ綺麗で
subtitles.english: And the world I came to know is still so beautiful

subtitles.original: 新しい可能性を 生むだろう
subtitles.english: It will surely give birth to new possibilities

subtitles.original: 時のカケラの 願いから
subtitles.english: From a wish born of a fragment of time

subtitles.original: 救い信じて 溢れた想い
subtitles.english: Believing in salvation, these overflowing feelings

subtitles.original: 確かな 始まりに立って
subtitles.english: Stand at a certain beginning

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔 取り戻すよ
subtitles.english: I will take back your smile,

subtitles.original: 真実の 奇跡になって
subtitles.english: becoming a true miracle

subtitles.original: 呼んだ希望辿って 止めた世界を超えた
subtitles.english: Following the hope I called for, I surpassed the frozen world

subtitles.original: 諦めない想い いつしか心繋げた
subtitles.english: Feelings that won't give up eventually connected our hearts

subtitles.original: 泣いていたって笑って 明日迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Even if we were crying, let's smile and go greet tomorrow

subtitles.original: 決めた誓い辛くて 倒れても
subtitles.english: Even if the oath I made is painful and I fall...

subtitles.original: 君のココロを守るため
subtitles.english: ...it's all to protect your heart

subtitles.original: 君の
subtitles.english: To your...

subtitles.original: そばにいよう
subtitles.english: ...side, I will stay

subtitles.original: いつの間にか見つけてた 遠い夢
subtitles.english: A distant dream I found before I knew it

subtitles.original: 一人じゃ見えなかった景色
subtitles.english: A scenery I couldn't have seen alone

subtitles.original: 波打つ風の音 加速していく想いに
subtitles.english: To the sound of the surging wind and accelerating feelings,

subtitles.original: 戸惑いを覚えた
subtitles.english: I felt a sense of bewilderment

subtitles.original: ずっと追いかけた 理想の姿は
subtitles.english: The ideal self I've always chased

subtitles.original: まだ届かなくて 遠いけど
subtitles.english: is still out of reach and far away, but...

subtitles.original: きっとこの瞬間を かけがえないみんなで
subtitles.english: Surely, this moment, with everyone who is irreplaceable...

subtitles.original: 共に行こう
subtitles.english: ...let's go together
